title: Team recruitment for ool? (plat+)
body:
Hey guys im a d5 support main looking to participate in ool to improve and play in a team. The idea was recommended to me by my coach:) I'm a friendly person who loves teamwork so if anyone wants to give it a go thatd be awesome:) 
preferably between plat 2 and diamond 3:) if youre higher than diamond 3 id consider finding a better team :p

replies.body: d3 ad/jungle main. have had previous experience in teams and wouldn't mind starting out again. have recently been shot-caller on most occasions.
I'm d5 sign me up coach :)) I'm a jungle/adc main I can flex between roles
currently plat 2 in flex not sure if that counts but i love playing in a team environment and always look to improve in my mechanics and game sense.
